data.title: Impresa Pizzarotti & C. S.p.a: The latest figures, news and market research on Impresa Pizzarotti & C. S.p.a
data.meta_description: Pizzarotti Company, is one of the leading construction companies in Italy and abroad, founded in 1910 by Pietro Pizzarotti. The company operates in a variety of sectors, including infrastructure, construction, energy and the environment, and is committed to delivering high-quality projects while complying with environmental regulations and the highest safety standards. Pizzarotti is active in more than 20 countries and employs more than 6,000 people. The Pizzarotti Group consists of numerous companies, including Pizzarotti & C. S.p.A., Pizzarotti IBC, T.E.P. S.p.A., etc.
data.text: Pizzarotti Company, is one of the leading construction companies in Italy and abroad, founded in 1910 by Pietro Pizzarotti.
